Amarachi Okafor onye amụrụ n'afọ 1977 bụ Omenka nke Naịjirịa ,onye ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya n'omenala, okpukpe, akụkọ ihe mere eme, ihe gbasara jenda, mmekọahụ nke mmadụ, na ọtụtụ okwu akpụ n'ọnụ dị ka mgbasa nke Ebola virus na Afrika
N'afọ 2002 ọ gụrụ maka nka na Mahadum nke Naijirịa na 2007, n'otu Mahadum a, ọ nwetere nzere masta na ngalaba nka
Okafor bụ onye òtù nke El Anatsui si Atelier na ngwụcha 1990s
Okafor na-aru oru  eserese   Ọ bụ onye nlekọta na NGA (National Gallery of Art) na Abuja n'etiti 2008 na 2014
Na 2007 o meriri ebe obibi ndị omenaala Unesco-Aschberg, ya na Commonwealth Foundation Commonwealth Connections na 2010
Na 2014, ọ bụ onye mbụ na 2014 National Art Competition,  wee merie ihe ngbata nke mkpebi n'afọ ahụ
